atlantis.framework

Class DrawableGameComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.framework.GameComponent
      • atlantis.framework.DrawableGameComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrawable, IUpdateable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StateManager

    public class DrawableGameComponent
extends GameComponent
implements IDrawable
    A DrawableGameComponent is a GameComponent that is updated and drawn on each frame. It can be enabled or disabled and visible or invisible
    Author:
    Yannick
